summary: Completed frontend testing of CRM Acad√©mie Jacques Levinet. Successfully verified the critical focus bug fix in event creation forms. The EventModal component extraction prevents re-renders and maintains focus during typing.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown options in modal have overlay interception preventing clicks
ui_bugs.workaround: Use force=True in automation or click outside modal first

passed_tests: Event creation modal opening and display
Form focus retention in title field - NO focus loss during typing
Form focus retention in description field - NO focus loss during typing
Events page loading with existing events display
